value.title: How to choose Azure services to speed up your application | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Azure MVP Barry "Azure Barry" Luijbregts joins Scott Hanselman to outline how you can choose the right Azure services to speed up your application.  1:00 - Presentation  Azure services https://aka.ms/azfr/625/01  Pluralsight course: Microsoft Azure for Developers: What to Use When (paywall) https://aka.ms/azfr/625/02

value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to clone web apps using Azure App Services. value.title: How to create dev environments in minutes with Visual Studio Codespaces | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you’ll learn how to quickly spin up a fully configured development environment in minutes to edit, run and debug your applications from any device with Visual Studio Codespaces extension for Visual Studio Code. value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to debug Azure Functions with Visual Studio Code. To start debugging Azure Functions, create a breakpoint in Visual Studio Code. value.excerpt: In this video of the Azure Portal "How To" series, learn about a new offering in the App Service family, Static Web Apps. value.title: How to deploy an Azure Web App using only the CLI tool | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to successfully deploy an Azure Web App by using only the command-line (CLI) tool. Watch to learn how the Azure portal is not only helpful for working with resources, but it also is convenient for using a command-line to deploy web applications.
